trans-unit.source: Get started with Azure Notification Hubs | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Get started with Azure Notification Hubs | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you learn how to use Azure Notification Hubs to push notifications to Android devices.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you learn how to use Azure Notification Hubs to push notifications to Android devices.

trans-unit.source: Get started with Notification Hubs
trans-unit.target: Get started with Notification Hubs

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Baidu cloud push is a Chinese cloud service that you can use to send push notifications to mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Baidu cloud push is a Chinese cloud service that you can use to send push notifications to mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: This service is particularly useful in China, where delivering push notifications to Android is complex because of the presence of different app stores and push services, in addition to the availability of Android devices that are not typically connected to GCM (Google Cloud Messaging).
trans-unit.target: This service is particularly useful in China, where delivering push notifications to Android is complex because of the presence of different app stores and push services, in addition to the availability of Android devices that are not typically connected to GCM (Google Cloud Messaging).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This tutorial requires the following:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial requires the following:

trans-unit.source: Android SDK (we assume that you will use Eclipse), which you can download from the Android site
trans-unit.target: Android SDK (we assume that you will use Eclipse), which you can download from the Android site

trans-unit.source: Mobile Services Android SDK
trans-unit.target: Mobile Services Android SDK

trans-unit.source: Baidu Push Android SDK
trans-unit.target: Baidu Push Android SDK

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] To complete this tutorial, you must have an active Azure account.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] To complete this tutorial, you must have an active Azure account.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an account, you can create a free trial account in just a couple of minutes.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an account, you can create a free trial account in just a couple of minutes.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Azure Free Trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/?WT.mc_id=A0E0E5C02&returnurl=http%3A%2F%2Fazure.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdocumentation%2Farticles%2Fnotification-hubs-baidu-get-started%2F).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Azure Free Trial](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/?WT.mc_id=A0E0E5C02&returnurl=http%3A%2F%2Fazure.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdocumentation%2Farticles%2Fnotification-hubs-baidu-get-started%2F).

trans-unit.source: Create a Baidu account
trans-unit.target: Create a Baidu account

trans-unit.source: To use Baidu, you must have a Baidu account.
trans-unit.target: To use Baidu, you must have a Baidu account.

trans-unit.source: If you already have one, log in to the [Baidu portal] and skip to the next step.
trans-unit.target: If you already have one, log in to the [Baidu portal] and skip to the next step.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, see the instructions below on how to create a Baidu account.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, see the instructions below on how to create a Baidu account.

trans-unit.source: Go to the [Baidu portal] and click the **登录** (**Login**) link.
trans-unit.target: Go to the [Baidu portal] and click the **登录** (**Login**) link.

trans-unit.source: Click **立即注册** to start the account registration process.
trans-unit.target: Click **立即注册** to start the account registration process.

trans-unit.source: Enter the required details—phone/email address, password, and verification code—and click **Signup**.
trans-unit.target: Enter the required details—phone/email address, password, and verification code—and click **Signup**.

trans-unit.source: You will be sent an email to the email address that you entered with a link to activate your Baidu account.
trans-unit.target: You will be sent an email to the email address that you entered with a link to activate your Baidu account.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your email account, open the Baidu activation mail, and click the activation link to activate your Baidu account.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your email account, open the Baidu activation mail, and click the activation link to activate your Baidu account.

trans-unit.source: Once you have an activated Baidu account, log in to the [Baidu portal].
trans-unit.target: Once you have an activated Baidu account, log in to the [Baidu portal].

trans-unit.source: Register as a Baidu developer
trans-unit.target: Register as a Baidu developer

trans-unit.source: Once you have logged in to the [Baidu portal], click **更多>>** (**more**).
trans-unit.target: Once you have logged in to the [Baidu portal], click **更多>>** (**more**).

trans-unit.source: Scroll down in the **站长与开发者服务 (Webmaster and Developer Services)** section and click **百度开放云平台** (**Baidu open cloud platform**).
trans-unit.target: Scroll down in the **站长与开发者服务 (Webmaster and Developer Services)** section and click **百度开放云平台** (**Baidu open cloud platform**).

trans-unit.source: On the next page, click **开发者服务** (**Developer Services**) on the top-right corner.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, click **开发者服务** (**Developer Services**) on the top-right corner.

trans-unit.source: On the next page, click **注册开发者** (**Registered Developers**) from the menu on the top-right corner.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, click **注册开发者** (**Registered Developers**) from the menu on the top-right corner.

trans-unit.source: Enter your name, a description, and a mobile phone number for receiving a verification text message, and then click **送验证码** (**Send Verification Code**).
trans-unit.target: Enter your name, a description, and a mobile phone number for receiving a verification text message, and then click **送验证码** (**Send Verification Code**).

trans-unit.source: Note that for international phone numbers, you need to enclose the country code in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: Note that for international phone numbers, you need to enclose the country code in parentheses.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a United States number, it will be **(1)1234567890**.
trans-unit.target: For example, for a United States number, it will be **(1)1234567890**.

trans-unit.source: You should then receive a text message with a verification number, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: You should then receive a text message with a verification number, as shown in the following example:

trans-unit.source: Enter the verification number from the message in **验证码** (**Confirmation code**).
trans-unit.target: Enter the verification number from the message in **验证码** (**Confirmation code**).

trans-unit.source: Finally, complete the developer registration by accepting the Baidu agreement and clicking **提交** (**Submit**).
trans-unit.target: Finally, complete the developer registration by accepting the Baidu agreement and clicking **提交** (**Submit**).

trans-unit.source: You will see the following page on successful completion of registration:
trans-unit.target: You will see the following page on successful completion of registration:

trans-unit.source: Create a Baidu cloud push project
trans-unit.target: Create a Baidu cloud push project

trans-unit.source: When you create a Baidu cloud push project, you receive your app ID, API key, and secret key.
trans-unit.target: When you create a Baidu cloud push project, you receive your app ID, API key, and secret key.

trans-unit.source: Once you have logged in to the [Baidu portal], click **更多>>** (**more**).
trans-unit.target: Once you have logged in to the [Baidu portal], click **更多>>** (**more**).

trans-unit.source: Scroll down in the **站长与开发者服务** (**Webmaster and Developer Services**) section and click **百度开放云平台** (**Baidu open cloud platform**).
trans-unit.target: Scroll down in the **站长与开发者服务** (**Webmaster and Developer Services**) section and click **百度开放云平台** (**Baidu open cloud platform**).

trans-unit.source: On the next page, click **开发者服务** (**Developer Services**) on the top-right corner.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, click **开发者服务** (**Developer Services**) on the top-right corner.

trans-unit.source: On the next page, click **云推送** (**Cloud Push**) from the **云服务** (**Cloud Services**) section.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, click **云推送** (**Cloud Push**) from the **云服务** (**Cloud Services**) section.

trans-unit.source: Once you are a registered developer, you will see **管理控制台** (**Management Console**) at the top menu.
trans-unit.target: Once you are a registered developer, you will see **管理控制台** (**Management Console**) at the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Click **开发者服务管理** (**Developers Service Management**).
trans-unit.target: Click **开发者服务管理** (**Developers Service Management**).

trans-unit.source: On the next page, click **创建工程** (**Create Project**).
trans-unit.target: On the next page, click **创建工程** (**Create Project**).

trans-unit.source: Enter an application name and click **创建** (**Create**).
trans-unit.target: Enter an application name and click **创建** (**Create**).

trans-unit.source: Upon successful creation of a Baidu cloud push project, you will see a page with **AppID**, **API Key**, and **Secret Key**.
trans-unit.target: Upon successful creation of a Baidu cloud push project, you will see a page with **AppID**, **API Key**, and **Secret Key**.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the API key and secret key, which we will use later.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the API key and secret key, which we will use later.

trans-unit.source: Configure the project for push notifications by clicking **云推送** (**Cloud Push**) on the left pane.
trans-unit.target: Configure the project for push notifications by clicking **云推送** (**Cloud Push**) on the left pane.

trans-unit.source: On the next page, click the **推送设置** (**Push settings**) button.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, click the **推送设置** (**Push settings**) button.

trans-unit.source: On the configuration page, add the package name that you will be using in your Android project in the **应用包名** (**Application package**) field, and then click **保存设置** (**Save**).
trans-unit.target: On the configuration page, add the package name that you will be using in your Android project in the **应用包名** (**Application package**) field, and then click **保存设置** (**Save**).

trans-unit.source: You will see the **保存成功！** (**Successfully saved!**) message.
trans-unit.target: You will see the **保存成功！** (**Successfully saved!**) message.

trans-unit.source: Configure your notification hub
trans-unit.target: Configure your notification hub

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the [Azure portal], and then click **+NEW** at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the [Azure portal], and then click **+NEW** at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Click **App Services**, click **Service Bus**, click **Notification Hub**, and then click **Quick Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **App Services**, click **Service Bus**, click **Notification Hub**, and then click **Quick Create**.

trans-unit.source: Provide a name for your **Notification Hub**, select the **Region** and the **Namespace** where this notification hub will be created, and then click **Create a New Notification Hub**.
trans-unit.target: Provide a name for your **Notification Hub**, select the **Region** and the **Namespace** where this notification hub will be created, and then click **Create a New Notification Hub**.

trans-unit.source: Click the namespace in which you created your notification hub, and then click **Notification Hubs** at the top.
trans-unit.target: Click the namespace in which you created your notification hub, and then click **Notification Hubs** at the top.

trans-unit.source: Select the notification hub that you created, and then click **Configure** from the top menu.
trans-unit.target: Select the notification hub that you created, and then click **Configure** from the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the **baidu notification settings** section and enter the API key and secret key that you obtained from the Baidu console previously for your Baidu cloud push project.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the **baidu notification settings** section and enter the API key and secret key that you obtained from the Baidu console previously for your Baidu cloud push project.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Dashboard** tab at the top for the notification hub, and then click **View Connection String**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Dashboard** tab at the top for the notification hub, and then click **View Connection String**.

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the **DefaultListenSharedAccessSignature** and **DefaultFullSharedAccessSignature** from the **Access connection information** window.
trans-unit.target: Make a note of the **DefaultListenSharedAccessSignature** and **DefaultFullSharedAccessSignature** from the **Access connection information** window.

trans-unit.source: Connect your app to the notification hub
trans-unit.target: Connect your app to the notification hub

trans-unit.source: In Eclipse ADT, create a new Android project (**File** > **New** > **Android Application Project**).
trans-unit.target: In Eclipse ADT, create a new Android project (**File** > **New** > **Android Application Project**).

trans-unit.source: Enter an **Application Name** and ensure that the **Minimum Required SDK** version is set to **API 16: Android 4.1**.
trans-unit.target: Enter an **Application Name** and ensure that the **Minimum Required SDK** version is set to **API 16: Android 4.1**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next** and continue following the wizard until the **Create Activity** window appears.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next** and continue following the wizard until the **Create Activity** window appears.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that **Blank Activity** is selected, and finally select **Finish** to create a new Android Application.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that **Blank Activity** is selected, and finally select **Finish** to create a new Android Application.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the **Project Build Target** is set correctly.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the **Project Build Target** is set correctly.

trans-unit.source: Download and unzip the [Mobile Services Android SDK], open the **notificationhubs** folder, copy the **notification-hubs-x.y.jar** file to the **libs** folder of your Eclipse project, and refresh the *libs* folder.
trans-unit.target: Download and unzip the [Mobile Services Android SDK], open the **notificationhubs** folder, copy the **notification-hubs-x.y.jar** file to the **libs** folder of your Eclipse project, and refresh the *libs* folder.

trans-unit.source: Download and unzip the [Baidu Push Android SDK], open the **libs** folder, and then copy the **pushservice-x.y.z** jar file and the **armeabi** & **mips** folders in the **libs** folder of your Android application.
trans-unit.target: Download and unzip the [Baidu Push Android SDK], open the **libs** folder, and then copy the **pushservice-x.y.z** jar file and the **armeabi** & **mips** folders in the **libs** folder of your Android application.

trans-unit.source: Open the **AndroidManifest.xml** file of your Android project and add the permissions that are required by the Baidu SDK.
trans-unit.target: Open the **AndroidManifest.xml** file of your Android project and add the permissions that are required by the Baidu SDK.

trans-unit.source: Add the **android:name** property to your **application** element in **AndroidManifest.xml**, replacing *yourprojectname* (e.g., **com.example.BaiduTest**).
trans-unit.target: Add the **android:name** property to your **application** element in **AndroidManifest.xml**, replacing *yourprojectname* (e.g., **com.example.BaiduTest**).

trans-unit.source: Make sure that this project name matches the one that you configured in the Baidu console.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that this project name matches the one that you configured in the Baidu console.

trans-unit.source: Add the following configuration within the application element after the **.MainActivity** activity element, replacing *yourprojectname* (e.g., **com.example.BaiduTest**):
trans-unit.target: Add the following configuration within the application element after the **.MainActivity** activity element, replacing *yourprojectname* (e.g., **com.example.BaiduTest**):

trans-unit.source: Add a new class called **ConfigurationSettings.java** to the project.
trans-unit.target: Add a new class called **ConfigurationSettings.java** to the project.

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to it:
trans-unit.target: Add the following code to it:

trans-unit.source: Set the value of **API_KEY** with what you retrieved from the Baidu cloud project earlier, **NotificationHubName** with your notification hub name from the Azure portal and **NotificationHubConnectionString** with DefaultListenSharedAccessSignature from the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Set the value of **API_KEY** with what you retrieved from the Baidu cloud project earlier, **NotificationHubName** with your notification hub name from the Azure portal and **NotificationHubConnectionString** with DefaultListenSharedAccessSignature from the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Add a new class called **DemoApplication.java**, and add the following code to it:
trans-unit.target: Add a new class called **DemoApplication.java**, and add the following code to it:

trans-unit.source: Add another new class called **MyPushMessageReceiver.java**, and add the code below to it.
trans-unit.target: Add another new class called **MyPushMessageReceiver.java**, and add the code below to it.

trans-unit.source: This is the class that handles the push notifications that are received from the Baidu push server.
trans-unit.target: This is the class that handles the push notifications that are received from the Baidu push server.

trans-unit.source: Open **MainActivity.java**, and add the following to the **onCreate** method:
trans-unit.target: Open **MainActivity.java**, and add the following to the **onCreate** method:

trans-unit.source: Send notifications to your app
trans-unit.target: Send notifications to your app

trans-unit.source: You can send notifications by using Azure Notification Hubs from any backend that uses our REST interface.
trans-unit.target: You can send notifications by using Azure Notification Hubs from any backend that uses our REST interface.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, we show it using a .NET console app.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, we show it using a .NET console app.

trans-unit.source: Create a new Visual C# console application:
trans-unit.target: Create a new Visual C# console application:

trans-unit.source: Add a reference to the Azure Service Bus SDK with the WindowsAzure.ServiceBus NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: Add a reference to the Azure Service Bus SDK with the WindowsAzure.ServiceBus NuGet package.

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Studio main menu, click **Tools**, click **Library Package Manager**, and then click **Package Manager Console**.
trans-unit.target: In the Visual Studio main menu, click **Tools**, click **Library Package Manager**, and then click **Package Manager Console**.

trans-unit.source: Then, in the console window, type the following and press Enter:
trans-unit.target: Then, in the console window, type the following and press Enter:

trans-unit.source: Open the file **Program.cs** and add the following using statement:
trans-unit.target: Open the file **Program.cs** and add the following using statement:

trans-unit.target: In your `Program` class, add the following method and replace *DefaultFullSharedAccessSignatureSASConnectionString* and *NotificationHubName* with the values that you have.

trans-unit.target: Add the following lines in your **Main** method:

trans-unit.source: Test your app
trans-unit.target: Test your app

trans-unit.source: To test this app with an actual phone, just connect the phone to your computer by using a USB cable.
trans-unit.target: To test this app with an actual phone, just connect the phone to your computer by using a USB cable.

trans-unit.source: This loads your app onto the attached phone.
trans-unit.target: This loads your app onto the attached phone.

trans-unit.source: To test this app with the emulator, on the Eclipse top toolbar, click **Run**, and then select your app.
trans-unit.target: To test this app with the emulator, on the Eclipse top toolbar, click **Run**, and then select your app.

trans-unit.source: This starts the emulator, and then loads and runs the app.
trans-unit.target: This starts the emulator, and then loads and runs the app.

trans-unit.source: The app retrieves the 'userId' and 'channelId' from the Baidu Push notification service and registers with the notification hub.
trans-unit.target: The app retrieves the 'userId' and 'channelId' from the Baidu Push notification service and registers with the notification hub.

trans-unit.source: To send a test notification when using the .NET console application, just press the F5 key in Visual Studio to run the application.
trans-unit.target: To send a test notification when using the .NET console application, just press the F5 key in Visual Studio to run the application.

trans-unit.source: The application will send a notification that will appear in the top notification area of your device or emulator.
trans-unit.target: The application will send a notification that will appear in the top notification area of your device or emulator.
